attributes.action: Bring in legislation that bans shops & establishments displaying Tobaco products
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The display of tobaco products for sale should be made illegal in all premises & establishments & smoking in vehicles banned with fines for breaking the law being set at £1000.00 per offence, & in the case of smoking while driving liable to a 12 month driving ban plus the £1000.00 fine. Also ban parents smoking in front of children
